body:
Hey I am posting to the avicus community today to request people to vote on who they think is best pvper on this list, If you don't think its me don't vote just be honest. Just a few points on this list. Stimpay and ApacheBlitz are both ahead of me and I killed Stimpay with 6 pots left and haven't fought ApacheBlitz in a while but pretty sure I would beat him. I am mainly basing this off combos not potpvp skills or archery or whatever else you may want to base it off of. Anyway my avicus babes please support me on this. Maybe if we try hard we can put me above that overated bajancanadian -.-

http://www.thetoptens.com/minecraft-pvp-players/
body_tagged:

I am mainly basing this off combos not potpvp skills or archery or whatever else you may want to base it off of. Anyway my avicus babes please support me on this. Maybe if we try hard we can put me above that overated bajancanadian -.-

http://www.thetoptens.com/minecraft-pvp-players/
